meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by hemoglobinuria.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a hemoglobinuric condition.
meanings.sent2: The hemoglobinuric test confirmed the presence of hemoglobin in the urine.
meanings.sent3: The hemoglobinuric urine sample turned a deep red color, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her hemoglobinuric symptoms painted a vivid picture of her health issues.
meanings.sent5: The hemoglobinuric nature of the illness made it easily detectable in the lab.

meanings.definition: Causing or resulting in the presence of hemoglobin in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The medication had a hemoglobinuric effect on the patient's urine.
meanings.sent2: The hemoglobinuric reaction in the body led to abnormal urine color.
meanings.sent3: The hemoglobinuric side effect of the treatment was unexpected but harmless.
meanings.sent4: His hemoglobinuric diet caused a stir among the medical community.
meanings.sent5: The hemoglobinuric impact of the disease was evident in the lab results.
